ValidationRule.description: Ensures that before an opportunity can be moved to awaiting terms, we must have a date when scope of advice was accepted and a medium of scope acceptance. Applies to advice opportunities only.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( StageName,"Await terms" ) && (ISBLANK( Date_scope_of_advice_accepted__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Medium_of_Scope_Acceptance__c ,"" )) && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advice_Opportunity"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the 'Scope of Advice' section before moving to await terms.
